## Shape.InputRange property

Gets or sets the worksheet range used to fill the specified combo box.

```csharp
public string InputRange { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.InputRange.Equals("$B$6:$B10"))
    shape.InputRange = "$A$1:$A$5";
```
